# Contibuting Guidelines
Thanks for contributing!
Please follow the instructions below to keep this repo toight like a tiger
## I found a bug!
Congrats! Go help Super Earth and open up an issue with our [Bug Report form](https://github.com/SET08103-CW-Group4Fri11/devops/issues)
## I want a new feature added!
Easy cowboy! Open up an issue with our [Feature | User Story template](https://github.com/SET08103-CW-Group4Fri11/devops/issues)
## I have a fix for a bug/enhancement
Alright, alright, alright, please [open up a PR](https://github.com/SET08103-CW-Group4Fri11/devops/compare/develop...develop) make sure that you change to your branch the compare dropdown: 
> compare: my_branch
